title: Technical SEO - SEO Blog by Ahrefs
description: Technical SEO helps search engines find, crawl, and index the pages on your website. You won't get any organic traffic if they can't do this. Check out the resources below to learn how to fix common technical issues.
content: SEO General SEOKeyword ResearchOn-Page SEOLink BuildingTechnical SEOLocal SEOEnterprise SEO Marketing General MarketingContent MarketingAffiliate MarketingPaid MarketingVideo Marketing Data & Studies Product Guides SEOKeyword ResearchOn-Page SEOLink BuildingTechnical SEOLocal SEO Search Search Subscribe Menu Search SEO General SEO Keyword Research On-Page SEO Link Building Technical SEO Local SEO Enterprise SEO Marketing General Marketing Content Marketing Affiliate Marketing Paid Marketing Video Marketing Data & Studies Product Guides SEO Keyword Research On-Page SEO Link Building Technical SEO Local SEO Subscribe Technical SEOTechnical SEO helps search engines find, crawl, and index the pages on your website. You won't get any organic traffic if they can't do this. Check out the resources below to learn how to fix common technical issues.Our Best Articles on Technical SEO We handpicked these from the 250+ posts on the blog. The Beginner’s Guide to Technical SEO Improve search engines' ability to find, crawl, understand, and index your pages. 11 Types Of Redirects & Their SEO Impact Learn about all the different types of redirects and their SEO impact. Duplicate Content: Why It Happens and How to Fix It Understand why duplicate content can be bad for SEO and how to fix it. Canonical Tags: A Simple Guide for Beginners Learn how to combat duplicate content issues with cannonicalization. Hreflang: The Easy Guide for Beginners Improve Google's understanding of multilingual content with hreflang. JavaScript SEO Issues & Best Practices Find out how Google handles JavaScript and how to troubleshoot SEO issues. Most Recent ArticlesGeneral SEO, Technical SEO Crawl Me Maybe?
